segments.text: Front desk . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m going to check out tomorrow . Then we ’ ll be back in a week ’ s time . Can I leave my luggage here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Sure . You do have storage service . When will be checking out tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About nine thirty in the morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Shall we arrange a bail boy to pick up your luggage at nine o ’ clock ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I have your room number please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 1218 . we ’ ll collect your luggage at nine o ’ clock tomorrow . Would you then come to the front desk to get your storage receipt please ?
segments.speaker: S1
